content: विनोदः {@--1@} Removing, driving away; श्रमविनोद. {@--2@} A diversion, an amusement, any interesting or amusing pursuit or occupation; प्रायेणैते रमणविरहेष्वंगनानां विनोदाः <ls>Me. 87</ls>; मिथ्यैव व्यसनं वदंति मृगयामीदृग्विनोदः कुतः <ls>Ś. 2. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Play, sport, pastime. {@--4@} Eagerness, vehement desire. {@--5@} Pleasure, happiness, gratification; विलपनवितोदोप्यसुलभः <ls>U. 3. 30</ls>; जनयतु रसिकजनेषु मनोरमरतिरसभावविनोदं <ls>Gīt. 12.</ls> {@--6@} A particular mode of sexual enjoyment. {@--7@} A kind of house.
